articles.description: Texas Tech has signed Chris Beard to a new six-year deal worth more than $19 million.
articles.headline: Texas Tech signs coach Chris Beard to six-year deal

images.caption: Chris Beard just got a new deal from Texas Tech.
images.name: Chris Beard [600x400] - Copy

articles.description: Seth Greenberg explains why the Wolverines have to stay engaged in order to sustain their momentum after winning their second consecutive Big Ten tournament.
articles.headline: Will layoff impact Michigan's NCAA tournament chances?

images.caption: Seth Greenberg explains why the Wolverines have to stay engaged in order to sustain their momentum after winning their second consecutive Big Ten tournament.
images.name: Will layoff impact Michigan's NCAA tournament chances?

articles.description: Of the five biggest conference tournaments beginning this week, which No. 1 seed is most likely to win the whole thing?
articles.headline: Capital One Fan Vote: Which top team is most likely to win its conference tourney?

articles.description: Memphis coach Tubby Smith, who has been a head coach at six different schools, thinks that allowing players to transfer more freely teaches them to quit.
articles.headline: Tubby Smith thinks allowing transfers teaches athletes to quit.

images.caption: Tubby Smith, who has been the head coach at six different NCAA schools, doesn't like players being allowed to transfer.
images.name: Tubby Smith [600x400]

articles.description: Virginia is now the unanimous No. 1 in the AP Top 25, while Michigan made a big jump into the top 10 after winning the Big Ten tournament title.
articles.headline: Virginia unanimous No. 1 in AP poll; Michigan up to No. 7 after winning Big Ten tournament

images.caption: In a game that was tight and came down to the final minute, the Fighting Irish were unable to make a late field goal as the No. 1 Cavaliers hold on to win 62-57.
images.name: Virginia hangs on against Notre Dame
